statements.chinese: 告诉你重要的某些事情

statements.english: you don't have to teach me how to use the dictionary

statements.english: you don't have to teach me how to use the internet

statements.english: I don't want to show you anything

statements.english: you have to show me how to use the internet

statements.chinese: 你不需要展示给我们如何做这件事
